parts.name: Discovery
parts.text: One sunny day, while exploring a particularly dense part of the jungle, Aria stumbled upon a hidden path. Do you follow the path?

options.text: Yes, go into the unknown and explore
No, go back to the village

parts.name: change
parts.text: As she walked, the sounds of the jungle faded away, replaced by the chirping of birds and the rustling of leaves. The path finally took its end. Aria deciding to take a quick rest, until suddenly a strange noise
